data.name: Error_CantFindPreviewTool
data.value: Cannot find the preview tool {0}. Verify the transform settings in Tools\Options.

data.name: Error_FileToTransformNotFound
data.value: Unable to preview transform. No source file found for {0}. Check to see if the file has not been renamed or removed from the project.
data.comment: Error message for when a transform file has no corresponding source file.

data.name: Error_NoPreviewToolSpecified
data.value: No preview tool specified. You can set a preview tool in the transform settings in Tools\Options.

data.name: Error_SavingProjectFile
data.value: Unable to save the project file {0}. {1}

data.name: Error_SourceFileNotFound
data.value: The source file for the transform {0} was not found.

data.name: Error_TransformFileNotFound
data.value: The transform file {0} was not found.

data.name: NugetInstall_ErrorOutput
data.value: Error installing SlowCheetah NuGet package to {0}.
data.comment: Text to be shown in the output window if there is an error with installing the SlowCheetah Nuget package

data.name: NugetInstall_FinishedOutput
data.value: Finished installing SlowCheetah NuGet package to {0}.
data.comment: Text to be shown in the output window when the SlowCheetah Nuget package is done installing

data.name: NugetInstall_InstallingOutput
data.value: Installing SlowCheetah NuGet package to {0} ...
data.comment: Text to be shown in the output window as the SlowCheetah NuGet package is being installed

data.name: NugetInstall_Text
data.value: In order to execute transform on build, you will need the SlowCheetah NuGet package. Do you want to install the package now?
data.comment: Text for the prompt to install the SlowCheetah NuGet package

data.name: NugetInstall_Title
data.value: Install SlowCheetah NuGet package
data.comment: Title for the prompt to install the SlowCheetah NuGet package

data.name: NugetUpdate_Link
data.value: https://github.com/Microsoft/slow-cheetah/blob/main/doc/update.md
data.comment: Link to the update info for the SlowCheetah Nuget package

data.name: NugetUpdate_Text
data.value: It seems that you have an older version of the SlowCheetah package installed. In order to avoid conflicts, you should update you package. Doing so may cause changes to your project file. Do you wish to update now?
data.comment: Text for the prompt to update the SlowCheetah NuGet package

data.name: NugetUpdate_Title
data.value: Update SlowCheetah NuGet package
data.comment: Title for the prompt to update the SlowCheetah NuGet package

data.name: NugetUpdate_WaitText
data.value: Updating the SlowCheetah NuGet package, this may take a few seconds
data.comment: Text for the wait dialog on update of the NuGet package

data.name: NugetUpdate_WaitTitle
data.value: SlowCheetah Update
data.comment: Title for the wait dialog on update of the NuGet package

data.name: String_FormatTransformFilename
data.comment: This is the format string for the new transform file's filename.

data.name: TransformPreview_Caption
data.value: {0} Preview

data.name: TransformPreview_ErrorMessage
data.value: There was an error transforming your file. See the error list for more details
data.comment: Error message to be shown upon failing Preview Transform

data.name: TransformPreview_LeftLabel
data.value: Original {0}

data.name: TransformPreview_RightLabel
data.value: Transformed {0} (by {1} )

data.name: TransformPreview_ToolTip
data.value: {0} Preview
